text: Oh Hu-seong (; born 25 August 1999) is a South Korean football midfielder, who plays for Daegu FC in the K League 1. ==Club career== Born on 25 August 1999, he made his debut for the club on 1 December 2018, coming on as a substitute against Gangwon FC in the K League 1. ==Club career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | Continental ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
